description: Learn how to make tabouli using quinoa and broccoli with this nutritionally approved recipe. Enjoy this healthier side dish alongside wraps or falafel.
name: Quinoa & Broccoli Tabouli Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup Macro organic tri-colour quinoa, rinsed
0.5 bunch mint, leaves picked, finely chopped
0.25 cup dry roasted almonds, roughly chopped (to serve)
0.5 pomegranate, arils removed and reserved (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Cook quinoa according to packet instructions. Set aside to cool completely.
Separate broccoli stem from florets and roughly chop stem. Place stem in a food processor and blitz until finely chopped. Thinly slice florets.
Combine quinoa, broccoli stem and florets, herbs and onion in a large bowl.
Combine tahini, yoghurt and lemon juice. Season with pepper.
Transfer tabouli to a large platter and sprinkle with almonds and pomegranate. Serve with dressing.
